name: UX Researcher
description:
Hello, we’re EPAM Design team, and we are currently seeking an UX Researcher to join our growing creative team in Moscow.

This position will be key in helping manage a growing business unit within EPAM that will focus on digital strategy, experience, and visual design.

Here you will collaborate with multinational teams, contribute to a myriad of innovative projects that deliver the most creative and cutting-edge solutions, and have an opportunity to continuously learn and grow. No matter where you are located, you will join a dedicated, creative, and diverse community that will help you discover your fullest potential.

WHAT YOU’LL DO

  • Deeply understand the experience of users, be able to measure their experience across touchpoints, and identify opportunities and methods to improve the quality of their experience
  • Identify and communicate research goals, set research strategy, create and implement research plans and scripts
  • Assist in a range of generative and evaluative research methods including: contextual inquiry, card sorting, usability testing, heuristic analysis, A/B testing, cognitive walkthroughs, focus groups, literature reviews, user observations, workflow analysis, usability tests, interviews, participatory design sessions
  • Synthesize research and provide insights to key team members to drive design decisions
  • Participate in the design of data-driven product and service strategy documentation including personas, mental models, customer journey maps, workflow documentation and product and service vision prototypes
  • Participate and help facilitate workshops to ideate and collaborate across disciplines, and translate user insights into innovative products and services
  • Identify and reconcile discrepancies in the application of user-interface styles, patterns, and standards across product groups and propose ways to ensure compliance
  • Present research findings and design work to internal teams as and clients

REQUIREMENTS

  • 2+ years of research and UX design experience
  • Strong ability to conduct user research, testing activities and deliverables
  • Experience with mixed methods research methodologies is a plus
  • Stellar verbal and written communication skills
  • Ability to create and tell stories both internally and to clients
  • Experience working on enterprise digital product development (applications and websites)

WE OFFER

  • Innovative solutions delivery to the world’s digital changes
  • Experience exchange with colleagues all around the world
  • Opportunities for self-realization
  • Friendly team and enjoyable working environment
  • Engineering, corporate, and social events
  • Social package: professional & soft skills training, medical & family care programs, sports
  • Free English classes
  • Flexible working schedule, and remote work, even able to work from any location if it is allowed on the project you work right now
